reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater vest beautiful and well-made, with soft stretchy material that's not itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous fit for layered look
items.body: Gorgeous - loved the brown color. It's soft, well made, great oversized shape that isn't baggy or shapeless. Looks wonderful over a shirt or t-shirt. Super happy & have ordered 2 more in different colors. Read more
items.author: KareBear

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Super cute vest that’s oversized! If you don’t want it so large I would order a size down but it’s meant to be oversized I think. Super comfy and soft material Read more
items.author: B

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very stylish look you’ll love
items.body: Very nice sweater vest. It is oversized as stated and very flattering on my plus size. Color is as stated and delivered timely. My only concern is how soft and delicate the material is. I’ve worn it twice and have two pulls already. Thankfully they’re small enough to maybe work back in. Even handling it to hang or fold is tricky, especially if you have nails. Glad I bought it in black as well. Read more
items.author: Diamiko

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater vest
items.body: I have bought three of these all in different sizes. L- XL -XXL. I got the xxl to go over a button down shirt dress and it’s perfect for that. (Will post pic when I wear it). Wearing XL now and I feel it’s a bit big. Waiting for the large to come in. I feel like that one will be perfect. (Will post pics of that one too when I wear it.) they are thick and very soft. Not too heavy. Very comfortable. I wish they had the little slit up the sides like the plain one does. I got mine on sale. 100% worth the price. Happy with both that I have so far! Will probably order more. You can style these so many ways. There was no weird smell. It doesn’t shed. Read more
items.author: KCP

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not oversized
items.body: Not oversized as pictured, but still a nice sweater vest for ordinary wear. Read more
items.author: BeachBum

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice look
items.body: Very nice sweater vest, get many compliments when I wear it. Comfortable and the fit is great. It works for Fall or Winter, would order again. Read more
items.author: Mrs Lentz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great vest
items.body: I love this vest. It's super soft, thick, and well made. I work in a courtroom that is ridiculously cold. I wear this under my blazer and this keeps me warm and cozy. Bonus, it's not clingy and hangs below my belt. So it keeps me covered in all my required locations. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Shelteeze

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish sweater vest
items.body: This is a very versatile sweater vest. I’ve worn it once and got many compliments. It’s very comfortable and the material is soft and comfy. I ordered my regular size and the fit was perfect. I wore a white collard mens style shirt under it with the hem hanging out. So chic- - I love it!! Read more
items.author: Claudia

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A Pink, A Yellow, 1 Khaki, C1 Blue, A Brown, D Black, 3a Grey, C5 Black, C1 Purple, D Brown, B Red, A Black, B Gray, A Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
